title: Very slow victory/defeat screen
body: Every time a match ends, I click continue and I sit there for 1 or 2 minutes before the game closes and the stats screen pops up. Does anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body:
After a match ends and you leave the game, your network needs to drop it's connection to the match and make a new connection to the client. It sounds like your network is having a hard time making that new connection, which is making it take awhile for the victory screen to pop up. 

Check out the [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get you setup with a more stable connection.
